name: Thanksgiving Dozer Story - Coin Dropping Fiesta for Boys and Girls (Best Free Coin Game)
name_original: Thanksgiving Dozer Story - Coin Dropping Fiesta for Boys and Girls (Best Free Coin Game)
description:
Bulldoze your way to royal riches with Tiny Pocket Dozer! Use the Thanksgiving’s bulldozing drawbridge to push gold coins, bonus gems and blue dragons of fortune into your coin hopper. Watch out, because the more coins you drop, the greater the chance your coins will fall off the edge of oblivion!

Very Addicting!

Features:
-Hard core coin-dropping strategy
-Multi-coin and Dragon Gem bonuses
-Casual game play

Unlock more coins!
